content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. To assist you with your electrical service, may I have your name please?
Thank you, Henry. Can you please provide your address so I can check if you are in our service area?
Sure, I live at 129 Evergreen Terrace, Springfield.
Thank you. Let me check if that address is within our service area.
It seems your address is outside our service area. However, I want to make sure before proceeding. Let me get some help on this.
reason: Address is outside service area, AI requested human help

content: Hi Henry, this is Judy from XYZ Services. I understand that the AI flagged your address as outside our service area. Could you please confirm the address again and if possible, any nearby landmarks? I want to see if we can assist you despite the initial check.
Yes, it's definitely 129 Evergreen Terrace, Springfield, near the old town square.

Thanks for confirming, Henry. I checked further and it seems our map had an outdated boundary. We do cover your area. I can help you schedule your electrical service now. What day and time work best for you?
Tomorrow morning around 10 would be perfect.
Let me check availability for tomorrow at 10 AM.
The time is available. I am booking your appointment now.
Your electrical service appointment is booked for tomorrow at 10 AM. We will send you a reminder before the appointment. Thank you for choosing XYZ Services!
